meaning_str.bing:
n. 耳；耳朵；有…耳朵的；耳朵…的
v. 抽穗
网络. 耳状物；听觉；听力

耳；耳朵；有…耳朵的；耳朵…的

耳朵；听觉；注意力；谷物的穗；玉米穗；（植物的）穗状物；感官器官（用于听觉）；辨音力
抽穗；长出穗头；<美俚>倾听；听到

1.en: With a light touch and keen ear, she had spent decades chronicling the ambivalent desires of her self-absorbed cohort.
1.cn: 靠着灵巧的处事能力和擅于倾听，她曾花了几十年的时间来记载她那专顾自己的同辈人的矛盾欲望。

2.en: And behold, one of those with Jesus stretched out his hand and drew his sword, and struck the slave of the high priest and took off his ear.
2.cn: 看哪，同耶稣在一起的人中，有一个伸手拔出刀来，将大祭司的奴仆砍了一刀，削掉了他一个耳朵。

3.en: Right ear is flat against his head, which shows that he is proper, respectful and does what is expected of him.
3.cn: 右耳几乎于脸平行，说明他有礼貌，懂得尊重别人，愿意像别人希望的那样做。

0.en: Look at your ear. Let's get you cleaned up.
0.cn: 瞧你的耳朵，我去帮你清理一下吧。

1.en: They don't hear it. Goes in one ear and out the other.
1.cn: 他们才没听到，一个耳朵进，另一个耳朵就出了。

2.en: Do you really think your lips in my ear is helping?
2.cn: 你真以为对着我耳朵这么讲话有用吗？

3.en: Yesterday. You made me look in your ear to see if there was a ladybug in it.
3.cn: 昨天，你要我帮你看看你耳朵里是不是有瓢虫。

4.en: If you hold them to your ear, you can hear the sea. Yes, I can hear the seaside.
4.cn: 把贝壳放在耳朵上可以听见大海的声音。没错，我听见了大海的声音。

5.en: If you hold them to your ear, you can hear the sea. Yes, I can hear the seaside.
5.cn: 把贝壳放在耳朵上可以听见大海的声音。没错，我听见了大海的声音。

6.en: I have seen stocks of corn with better physiques. Makes you wanna pull an ear off, Private.
6.cn: 我看库存的玉米都有更好的体质。让你想扯掉哪只耳朵，列兵。

7.en: Oh, and two years ago, you had a persistent ear infection. I hope that didn't cause any hearing loss.
7.cn: 两年前，你耳朵受持续性感染所苦，希望那没影响你的听力。

8.en: Don't be so hard on him. It's natural to be a little cranky when you have a quarter in your ear!
8.cn: 别对他这么凶嘛，他这么烦躁有情可原，因为他耳朵里有25美分！

9.en: Edmond, I think there's something behind your ear. Every one has found a chocolate egg.
9.cn: 啊，埃德蒙，我觉得你的耳朵后面好像有个东西。每个人都找到了巧克力彩蛋。

10.en: If you put a shell to your ear, you could hear the sea. I can hear the sea. I love my seashell.
10.cn: 你把海螺放在耳朵旁边，就可以听到海了。我听到海的声音了！我好喜欢这个海螺。

11.en: My justice is divine. My laws are so simple you could write them on a pig's ear. In fact, I have.
11.cn: 我就是最高法律，我的法律很简单，简单到可以写到猪耳朵上，我也的确写上去了。

12.en: It is not my leg that is itching. It is my ear. Is it better? Yes, thank you. Lunch time.
12.cn: 其实不是我的腿感觉有点痒，而是我的耳朵感觉有点痒。这样好些了吗？是的，谢谢你。午餐时间到！

13.en: Just last week, you took her to the doctor without even asking! 'Cause she had an ear infection! Let's say we're even.
13.cn: 就在上周，你带她去看医生，连问都没问我！因为她耳朵感染了！算我们扯平了！

14.en: Nothing changes. You painted a cat. The cat's on a bench! I don't see the bench. I will cut my ear off right now.
14.cn: 我画的就是啊。你画的是只猫。是长椅上的猫。我没看见长椅。我马上把我的耳朵割下来。

15.en: Doctor Brown Bear has come to see how Pedro is doing. How are we, today, Pedro? My ear is a bit itchy. Just here.
15.cn: 棕熊医生过来看看佩德罗的情况。今天感觉怎么样，佩德罗？我的耳朵感觉有点痒，就是这儿。

16.en: There was this great Polish guy, wire walker, Roman. He said he could tell when cable was at correct tension through his ass and through his ear. Ah!
16.cn: 有一个厉害的波兰走钢索人，罗曼，他说他能靠臀部和耳朵判断钢索是否拉得够紧。

17.en: Yeah, but he did have to have a bunch of stitches and he said that only once in a blue moon does a dog's ear grow back, so still hoping.
17.cn: 可是他必须帮它缝好多针，而且他还说只有出现蓝月亮时狗才会再长出耳朵来的，所以还有一点点希望。

18.en: When is the last time I asked you to do something that wasn't a medical emergency? Yesterday. You made me look in your ear to see if there was a ladybug in it.
18.cn: 我上一次叫你帮我做非紧急医疗的事是什么时候？昨天，你要我帮你看看你耳朵里是不是有瓢虫。

19.en: Here's my offer. Your board of directors, you got them in the other ear? Why don't you tell them this. If they dump you, I'll consider it.
19.cn: 我的提议如下。你的董事会成员，从另一只耳朵里能听到吗？不如你告诉他们。如果他们炒了你，我就考虑加入。
